## Corporation.getUpgradeLevelCost() method

Gets the cost to unlock the next level of a levelable upgrade

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  upgradeName | string | Name of the upgrade |
